game.name: Bob's Beaker Blobs
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Bob’s Beaker Blobs is a physics-based Suika-like merge puzzle. Use reagents to manipulate the blobs in your beaker, but be careful of Bob. He's trying to sabotage your experiment with his own reagents.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bob’s Beaker Blobs is a physics-based Suika-like merge puzzle. Use reagents to manipulate the blobs in your beaker, but be careful of Bob. He's trying to sabotage your experiment with his own reagents.
